main event: A bright light green object with a smoky trail was observed and faded before falling into the ocean.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 1 minute., The object had a tear drop shape and was bright greenish in color., It was noted that the object exhibited characteristics typical of a meteor., One observer felt it could have been a shooting star while another thought it was a flare., There was considerable air traffic in the area at the time.
sighted object: bright light green object with a smoky trail
witness description: Fredrick P. N. SA, USNR, Standby Lookout and Narvesan A. P. DC1, USN, Security Watch.
